entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:39 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
